name: Blocky Breaker (Windows and Android)
description:
@gaming_shar

Blocky Breaker

NO ADS NOR IN APP PURCHASES.

Note: Android version has been refined and is the complete version. Windows version is for those who wants to try out the game

Blocky Breaker brings back the classic block / brick breaker game directly to your android device. A quick, short, fun, challenging 10 levels game to play with friends and families. 

Try to get the high score:
  •  Assist Mode On: 149
  •  Assist Mode Off: 298
How to use the app:
  •  Tap and hold on the left / right side of the screen to move the paddle.
  •  Tap the upper half of the screen to launch the ball. 
  •  Launch the ball, break all the blocks, prevent the ball from going below and win the game. 
  •  Simple!
  •  10 levels to discover.
System Requirements (Windows):
  •  Windows 7, Windows 10
  •  Processor: Pentium +
  •  Minimum 512gb RAM
  •  50mb storage
System Requirements (Android):
  •  Android 4.4 +
  • 32 and 64 bits.
  •  Minimum 256 mb  RAM
  •  50 mb storage
Issue / Bug Report:

If you find any bugs or issues, please report by sending an email to ssharworks@gmail.com in the following format:

  •  What is the bug / issue you encountered.
  •  What was the observed behaviour (what has happened).
  •  What was the expected behaviour (what was supposed to happen).
  •  What were you doing in the application at the time of the bug.
  •  Any error messages or crash.
  •  Screenshots if possible.
